page.title: 09Torquay Boys' Grammar School
page.content: We have a brand new school in Shiphay. Our school lasts from 8.50am to 3.50pm each day from Monday to Friday. Our lessons are all 35 minutes each (unless they are a double.) Lessons include History, Geography, Maths, English, French, Biology, Chemistry, CDT, RE, Computing, Physics, Music, Art, PE and Games. We get short breaks in the morning and afternoon and 90 minutes for dinner. At break we go out and play things like football and cricket or we just mess about. We can also go to the library. Prefects make sure that we stay outside. If we are rude to them they give us school rules to copy out. The school canteen does good chips, sausages and burgers. we get 3 homeworks a night (30 minutes each!!) All in all school is OK.
